page.title: 12EDUCATION - BURGHFIELD
page.content: A child's day at school. On Wednesday, the first thing I do when I get to school is English. When everyone is sitting down , our teacher takes the register. Then we go to the hall for assembly. After assembly some people do Maths and some do Art. After play at 10.30, we carry on with our Maths till dinner at 12.00. I have school dinners which are quite nice. After we have had dinner we go out to play. When the bell goes, we get changed for rounders. We play on the field, while the third and fourth year boys play cricket. When we get back to school we change and then we have playtime. I usually play football. After play we tidy the room and sit down on the carpet for a story. Then we go home.
